name: behat/mink
description: Web acceptance testing framework for PHP 5.3

suggest.behat/mink-browserkit-driver: extremely fast headless driver for Symfony\Kernel-based apps (Sf2, Silex)
suggest.behat/mink-goutte-driver: fast headless driver for any app without JS emulation
suggest.behat/mink-selenium2-driver: slow, but JS-enabled driver for any app (requires Selenium2)
suggest.behat/mink-zombie-driver: fast and JS-enabled headless driver for any app (requires node.js)
